forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, this crisp morning unfolds under a canvas of clear blue skies, with the golden sunlight filtering through, offering a gentle warmth that will reach around 69 degrees by midday. As the day meanders on, the temperature will gradually dip to a comfortable 67 in the afternoon, making it a pleasantly mild day for outdoor pursuits. Winds, whispering from the southwest, will be present, occasionally gusting up to 21 mph, adding a lively touch to the tranquility of this day.

As evening approaches, the skies will flirt with a patchy layer of clouds, settling into a partially cloudy night with temperatures languishing around 59. With such splendid weather, it invites a variety of activities; a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park can provide a serene escape, while the calm of a café terrace beckons for those looking to enjoy a book or engage in quiet conversation. Dressing in layers is advised—perhaps a light sweater to wrap around oneself against the cool evening breeze. Today promises to be a sweet slice of San Francisco’s charm, perfect for both exploration and repose.
